meanings.definition: Consisting of a few monomeric units
meanings.sent1: The oligomeric structure of the molecule made it stable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the oligomeric properties of the material.
meanings.sent3: The oligomeric puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her oligomeric approach to problem-solving was efficient.
meanings.sent5: The oligomeric bond between them was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a polymer that consists of a small number of monomer units
meanings.sent1: The oligomeric chain was shorter than expected.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in oligomeric materials.
meanings.sent3: The oligomeric necklace was a unique fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: His ideas formed an oligomeric structure of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The oligomeric bridge connected the two sides seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a compound composed of a small number of similar molecules
meanings.sent1: The oligomeric compound showed promising results in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The team analyzed the oligomeric properties of the substance.
meanings.sent3: The oligomeric blend of flavors created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her oligomeric collection of songs resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The oligomeric mixture produced a vibrant color palette.
